title: Mine
lyrics:
There comes a time in a young man's life
He should settle down and find himself a wife
But I'm just fine because I know that you are mine
I fight crime online sometimes
Then write rhymes I hide behind

My switch, her wine, both crying

I'm fine if you are fine



Looking back on 2009

People said that it was raining all the time

I see sunshine because I know that you were mine



You say that I'm wasting your time

I smile and tell you things will be fine

For some reason, I just can't say I do



There comes a time in a young man's life

He should settle down and find himself a wife

But I'm just fine because I know that you are mine
